headline: How Are Mag 7 Earnings Shaping Up?
summary: The aggregate growth numbers for the Mag 7 group are impressive, with Q4 earnings on track to be up +21.9% from the same period last year on +18.1% higher revenues, continuing the recent outsized growth we've seen over recent quarters.

content.title: How Are Mag 7 Earnings Shaping Up?
content.summary: The aggregate growth numbers for the Mag 7 group are impressive, with Q4 earnings on track to be up +21.9% from the same period last year on +18.1% higher revenues, continuing the recent outsized growth we've seen over recent quarters.

headline: Why Franklin Resources (BEN) Is Up 5.2% After Earnings Beat And New AI Intelligence Hub Rollout
summary: Franklin Resources, Inc. recently reported fiscal first-quarter 2026 results, with revenue of US$2,327.1 million and net income of US$255.5 million, alongside basic earnings per share from continuing operations of US$0.46, all higher than the same period a year earlier. At the same time, the firm advanced its multi-year collaboration with Microsoft by launching Intelligence Hub, an AI-driven distribution platform designed to centralize data, automate workflows, and enhance client engagement...

headline: Amazon’s layoffs are staggering. We’ve seen this before
summary: Big Tech continues to wrestle with mass layoffs, most recently with Amazon’s announcement of 16,000 job cuts. It’s a trend that started long before the AI race: organizational change brought by the arrival of new technology.

content.title: Amazon’s layoffs are staggering. We’ve seen this before
content.summary: Big Tech continues to wrestle with mass layoffs, most recently with Amazon’s announcement of 16,000 job cuts. It’s a trend that started long before the AI race: organizational change brought by the arrival of new technology.

thumbnail.caption: An Amazon Go store at the company's headquarters in Seattle on January 28, 2026. Amazon recently announced that it'll cut 16,000 jobs, part of a greater wave of mass layoffs in the tech industry this past year. - M. Scott Brauer/Bloomberg/Getty Images

headline: Is the Stalled Nvidia-OpenAI Megadeal AI’s First Domino to Fall?
summary: Last September, Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) and OpenAI lit up the AI world with the announcement of a letter of intent for a “landmark strategic partnership” to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of Nvidia systems, backed by up to $100 billion of progressive investment as capacity came online. The agreement, though, was explicitly non‑binding and was dependent ... Is the Stalled Nvidia-OpenAI Megadeal AI’s First Domino to Fall?

headline: Microsoft’s US$750m Perplexity Deal And What It Means For Azure Valuation
summary: Microsoft, ticker NasdaqGS:MSFT, signed a three year, US$750 million Azure agreement with AI startup Perplexity. Perplexity plans to deploy models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and xAI through Microsoft Foundry as part of a multi cloud setup. The deal signals a shift for Perplexity, which previously leaned more heavily on AWS for its infrastructure. For you as an investor or market watcher, this deal sits at the intersection of cloud computing and generative AI workloads. Azure is a core business...

headline: Microsoft tests Windows 11 change that could reshape your desktop
summary: It's not the "big features" that change how people respond when they use Windows; it's the little pauses. The search for a setting that takes two seconds. The third time you open a system panel. The small "Where did they move that?" moments that add up until an OS upgrade seem more like a problem ...

content.title: Microsoft tests Windows 11 change that could reshape your desktop
content.summary: It's not the "big features" that change how people respond when they use Windows; it's the little pauses. The search for a setting that takes two seconds. The third time you open a system panel. The small "Where did they move that?" moments that add up until an OS upgrade seem more like a problem ...
